attributes.action: Trim the Fat from Local Gpvernment
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to abolish local council offices and their highly paid underworked officials.In its place I want to see an AREA Council who report to and work directly with Central Government on our behalf.This will not only save money but streamline matters when we (the tax payer) have a simple enquiry instead of being bounced between three offices as is the case here in Suffolk.For example three offices EACH owning different street lights.Three officials making decisions re said street lights.TWO salaries TOO many.
